parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The ID of the custom image.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the custom image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
